item.title: ECOM7121 The Social Graph
item.description: Facebook Paul Revenue and the Tipping Point Paul Revere’s famous midnight ride to rally support against the British in Concord, MA The British are coming…word spread like wildfire, the colonists were mobilized Start of the American Revolution Why is Paul Revere remembered and not William Dawes?,
